meanings.sent1: She redetermined her route after getting lost.

meanings.sent4: The coach redetermined the team's strategy for the game.
meanings.sent5: The scientist redetermined the results of the experiment to ensure accuracy.

meanings.sent5: The survey redetermined the preferences of the participants.
